title: How to Get the Headless Head Appearance in Roblox

steps.title: The Headless Horseman bundle can be purchased for 31,000 Robux.
steps.content: The Headless Horseman bundle can be purchased for 31,000 Robux. This is the most reliable way to get the "headless" appearance in Roblox . However, this item only goes on sale during the Halloween season. [1] X Research source If you don't have enough Robux in your account, you'll need to purchase more yourself or have a friend gift you .

steps.title: Void Smooth Brain.
steps.content: Void Smooth Brain. While not completely headless, this item will work with some hair and hats to give an invisible head look. You can purchase this item for 75 Robux.

steps.title: Glass Head.
steps.content: Glass Head. This item will turn the head transparent rather than remove it completely. You can purchase this item for 150 Robux.

steps.title: Lamp.
steps.content: Lamp. This item turns the head into a lamp-shape. The color of the lamp changes with the character's body color. You can purchase this item for 75 Robux.

steps.title: Hatchet Prop.
steps.content: Hatchet Prop. Rather than a head, players will have an axe propped in the neck. This could also work for a Halloween-themed character. You can purchase this item for 75 Robux.

steps.title: Grey-Black Cat.
steps.content: Grey-Black Cat. This item replaces the head with a lounging cat. You can purchase this item for 75 Robux.
